Description: Funerary papyrus of Padimin; sheet 3; Hieratic text; recto and verso.
Curator's comments: To be published by F. Herbin, Late Religious Texts. 2
The Beatifications are published in J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien III Osirisliturgien in Papyri der Spaetzeit (Heidelberg 2008).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (175)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57816) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57816)
